content: No, I didn't mean the current NBA playoffs, I was referring to the ones that started a few weeks ago when I was watching the Lakers vs Clippers game on April 15th. Anyway, back to golf, yeah, I think I'll take a lesson or two while I'm at Bandon Dunes, it would be great to get some tips on how to navigate the course. And yeah, my family and I usually play golf together on weekends, we really enjoy it.
